description: Try this hearty Swedish meatball recipe, perfect for those colder nights. Use pre-rolled meatballs for quick prep and serve with a creamy sauce.
name: Swedish Meatballs with Broccolini Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
400 g pkt Woolworths pork & veal meatballs

recipeInstructions.text: Top meatballs with parsley, season with pepper and serve with broccolini and bread.
Top meatballs with parsley, season with pepper and serve with broccolini and bread.
